messages.title: Working hard! Hundreds of people helped in Bethnal Green North
messages.content: Stephanie, Richard and Khan have been working hard to help residents with problems ranging from damp homes, filthy stairwells, employment, neighbour disputes and bullying in school.

messages.title: Beat Labour in 2010
messages.content: Vote Ajmal Masroor in Bethnal Green and Bow. The polls are clear, Britain has had enough of Labour. Thousands of jobs and businesses have been lost. Families have been hit hard in the pocket. A generation faces a future of debt. We deserve better.

issues.economy: Thousands of jobs and businesses have been lost.
issues.governance: Britain has had enough of Labour.

images.caption: Richard Macmillan clears up mess in Lysander House
